title: matchmaking
body:
please why is the matchmaking system so un balanced atm ?
we get smashed then we smash, its spastic right now

replies.body: Don't listen to this shit. The pool of players is too small, as a result finding a game quickly requires players with drastically different levels of ability to be playing together.
matchmaking is fine you just need to improve feel free to add me and i can help i out

Most games aren't a stomp because matchmaking is unbalanced, they're a stomp because a lot of people (especially in lower ratings) don't know how to play from behind and end up feeding once they have a small disadvantage. The same guy that just went 0-10 in a bronze game might well go 10-0 the next game  against the same players if an early gank or something goes the other way

Ranked matchmaking is fine, normal matchmaking is whats completely fucked and has been fucked since the release of this game, they should really fix it, challengers should never ever be matched with an unranked, i don't care what mode it is, it's unacceptable.

I never have problems with challengers in my game.. Sometimes they're  literally chilling and giving 0% of cares whether they win or lose. I know that the matchmaking is fine. You win games you lose games..  Rank means nothing in normal except for bronze. You can tell when a bronze is in the game when they think they know everything

Matchmaking is reasonably balanced in ranked depending at what time you play. In normals it can get pretty crazy, especially if people join parties with friends. I've had Diamonds and Challanger players in Silver elo. 

The seemingly inconsistent game difficulty is just due to lower elo players not knowing how to play from behind. So as soon as someone gets a small lead, everything goes to shit.

Because generally players are volatile and once a lead is established it's hard to reclaim it without punishing a mistake heavily

Not matchmaking, just life. Watch some challenger games, it even applies up in the higher echelons.
